contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 1, 2015 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-championship
Own Choice from a Specified List
The Torchbearer
Guild Hall, Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Choice of test piece: "Symphonic Variations on a theme by Eric Ball - The Torchbearer", Peter Graham, or "Facets of the Heart", Tom Davoren
First Prize - The Stanley Winter Trophy + £400
Second Prize – The Bob Kerwick Trophy + £200
Third Prize - The Squire Eccles Trophy + £150
The Elizabeth and Jack Mills Trophy to the Best Soloist
The Buster Porter Trophy to the Best Basses
The Michael Brooke Trophy to the Best Euphonium
The Stuart Pullin Trophy to the Winning MD.
In addition, the highest placed band in the Championship Section event, who is not already invited to the British Open Spring Festival in Blackpool, will gain an automatic invitation to compete in the Senior Trophy in May
Best Soloist: Beth Dilworth (flugel, Wingates) Best Basses: Rainford Best Euphonium: Yorkshire Imperial Urquart Travel
Spring Festival Invitation: Blidworth Welfare
Aug. 24, 2014, 4:05 p.m. Feb. 4, 2015, 2:09 p.m.
1 Wingates Band Paul Andrews The Torchbearer
2 Rainford Band Gareth Brindle The Torchbearer
3 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Stig Mærsk The Torchbearer
